Articles.Content:
So MechJeb is not turning my rocket no matter how high I allow its angle of attack to be. I have reset all settings to default, please help.

When it begins executing a gravity turn, it lights up green as if it is turning it to the max but nothing happens, and I checked, the ship turns and can even make it to orbit just fine so it is a problem with mech jeb.

The reaction wheels on the comman pod say idle, I turned rcs on no indication of it working

Edited April 4, 2016 by cup a joe
We'll need a picture of your rocket. It's hard to tell without it.
Are the control indicators in the bottom left corner moving?
